Regulation Name(s): Automated Fluorescence in situ Hybridization (FISH) Enumeration System
Specimen Type(s): Human breast cancer tissue (formalin-fixed, paraffin embedded)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Duet™M System workstation (microscope, CCD camera, motorized stage, computer, dedicated software)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Duet™M System automated workstation for cell detection, classification, and enumeration including HER-2/neu gene amplification via FISH in human breast cancer tissue specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use as an aid to pathologists in detection, classification and counting of cells of interest (hematopoietic, amniotic, urine, breast tissue) via multiple staining methods including FISH, supporting HER-2/neu gene to chromosome 17 signal ratio determination in breast cancer specimens using the Vysis PathVysion HER-2 DNA Probe Kit
